oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Elmer Bird Photo with Rubylith
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bird, Elmer;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A black and white half-length portrait of Elmer Byrd holding a banjo. A Rubylith masking film is taped to the photo. On the back of the photo, the following notes are handwritten, "Elmer Byrd 74.6%" and "3 1/2 inches high." To view a poster that features the metal photoplate made from this photo, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/20687.
